name: Sarah Gentry
text: Lovely experience, Dr Groysman is the best. I have seen several dermatologists before, none of them have been as professional, kind, knowledgeable and understanding as Dr Groysman. Everything was seem less from check in to check out.

name: Pam Griffith
text: Everyone was so nice. Treated you as if you were family. Doctor explained things to make it simple!

name: J Russell
text: I arrived exactly 10 minutes prior to my appointment time,checked in and waited for exactly 1 hour. I got up to go to the ladies room, and when I came back another patient in the waiting room told me they had called my name. I walked to the back to tell them that I was just in the ladies room, they said we went ahead and called someone else back you'll need to wait until they're done. Granted I was in the ladies room for all of 3 minutes, there was no one to tell at the front desk that I had to go to the ladies room.  All of that after I already been waiting for 65 minutes!!!!!  They showed zero remorse... no apologies, just "oh well..go and wait some more". I will NEVER GO BACK and I will make sure I spread the news...

name: Amy Bolt
text: I am so very appreciative of Dr. Wang and Dawn. They are very attentive and compassionate. I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatolgy.

name: Connie DeVoe
text: Even dealing with a power outage due to Tropical Storm Zeta, the staff were all friendly & as accommodating as they could be until power was restored. They fit me is as soon as possible and the doctor provided a clear care plan with detailed instructions.

name: Andy Barclay
text: Such attention to detail! Everyone in the office is friendly and courteous. Dr Groysman is outstanding!

name: Empty the Tanks
text: Amazing! Shelby at the front desk was absolutely wonderful and I highly recommended Shelly for a massage! She was exactly what I needed to relax and unwind!

name: Daphne Kirkpatrick
text: Let me just say we had the BEST deep tissue massage today with Kari! She will be the reason we go back! Best massage we have ever had! And sweet Shelby is always smiling on Saturday mornings. Absolutely love these people!

name: Keith Wills
text: I had an amazing experience this morning. Dr. Wang was amazing and Stephanie was awesome. It only took about 15 minutes for them to give me a prescription and send me about my way! This will be my new dermatologist from here on out!

name: Tracy Fleischmann
text: Very friendly for self pay patients. Upfront pricing with no nasty surprises. Knowledgeable doctor who didn't insist on unnecessary procedures. A good first dermatology experience. Definitely recommend.

name: Su Kim
text: Amazing service. All the staff were so kind. They helped us figure out the best treatment while looking out for us financially.

name: Court Deaton
text: Horrible. Dr Gerald is rude and condescending and makes you feel stupid every time you speak. Would not ever recommend!

name: Carolyn Willingham
text: I go to Dr. Groysman every 3 months for body checks.  Each time she is very thorough.  She has removed 4 skin cancers over the last 12 months without using Mohs surgery with very minimal scarring.  She and her staff are awesome!  I could not ask for a better dermatology group.

name: Michelle McGrew
text: I loved the assistant and Dr.Wang both were friendly and put me at ease. Will be back

name: Gloria Sanders
text: My first visit was awesome. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I look forward to trying some of the other services. Highly recommend.

name: marquiz savage
text: My visit was as comforting as possible.  Ever thing from the initial check-in to the check out was 1 heck of a gathering.  Everything was so smooth. Dr. Gerald and Dawn really laid all pertinent info for me on the table along with the appropriate way to tackle my skin issues.

name: Matthew Ware
text: I showed up at 1:50 in the afternoon for my 2:00 appointment and didn't get called back until 3:11. And that was only after I'd ask the receptionist what time my appointment was actually for. My time with the doctor only lasted 12 minutes. Multiple people in the waiting room had apparently been told that they showed up for their appointments at the wrong time. Unfortunately for the receptionist, most were able to show their appointment confirmation emails. One patient was saying that this has happened every time she's been there. Sounds like they've got a computer system to figure out, or at least need to do some remedial training on the check-in process. The doctor was fine, but patient support was seriously lacking.

resp.text: Mr. Ware, I am sorry to hear your visit took so much extra time. We  do strive to stay on time as possible. There are many reasons the clinic can run behind, but we obviously missed the mark for you. I will inquire about recurring issues with appointment times or other issues at the check in desk. Thanks for your feedback and we'll work to use it to address your concerns.

name: Judy Bresnan
text:
Have had the most amazing facials with Joy!! She is so knowledgeable not only about skincare products but what your face actually needs! Can't say enough good things about her.
I also had an wonderful time floating with my daughter. Had never done that before and it was so peaceful and relaxing wanted! Wanted something special to share with her and I have to say this fit the bill nicely. We both thoroughly enjoyed. The staff were so helpful through each process and we got snacks!!

resp.text: Spending an hour with Joy is always enjoyable. Adding a float makes it even better. Thanks for your feedback and visiting our office.

name: Karen Thompson
text: Cahaba Dermatology is awesome. The staff and the doctor was very kind and helpful. Each person explained each step of the visit, from check in to completion of my visit. I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Emily Westray
text: This was my first spa experience ever, and I got my eye lashes tinted. They look great! And the staff was so friendly. Very pleased, and can’t wait to go back!

resp.text: We are honored to have been apart of your first spa visit. Don't let it be your last, you deserve it! See you soon.

name: Cindy Partlow
text: Staff are pleasant and efficient.Dr. Groysman and her PA were  professional, friendly, and thorough. All of my concerns were addressed In a caring manner. Highly recommend to anyone!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: Dr. Gerald was so sweet and understanding. Listened to every word I said and took it into account. So refreshing to finally see a doctor who cares!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. Caring for our patients is a cornerstone of our office. Everything good starts from that single place.

name: Marsha Majors
text: Had a much needed massage today with Kari — I feel so much better after a long weekend of moving! Very friendly/clean/relaxing atmosphere! Will definitely be back👍🏼

resp.text: Moving can be both stressful and tough on the body. A massage was surely in order. Glad you got some relief from your visit and look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Stephanie Stephens
text: Such a wonderful experience! I met Dr. Ann Gerald and she was amazing! Very thorough and listened. Eager to help me with my unique issues due to a rare autoimmune disease. Highly recommend!!

name: Larry Thompson
text: Make you feel you are getting the best treatment possible. Staff and doctors are great.

name: kay chenoweth
text: Dr Grossman at Cahaba Derm is not only five star but a Rockstar!  She's been treating me since 2016 and done an amazing job. I Would recommend to her for any skin or health issues!

name: Cecelia Thompson
text: Hour massage with Carrie and Facial/Extraction with Tracy. Both were wonderful. I felt very comfortable.  They were thorough and very knowledgeable. High quality service! I will be back!

resp.text: That sounds like a great visit and glad you enjoyed the services. We are happy to have both Kari and Tracy on our team.

name: Caroline and Evan Crisp
text: My fiance and I decided to do a couples massage together to celebrate our engagement and I am so glad we did! The experience from start to finish made us feel so special. We felt as if we were the only clients in the building. The staff were friendly, courteous, and attentive. They took great pride in helping us feel comfortable and at ease. My fiance said that we will definitely be back for more services together.

name: James Hillegass
text: I recommend Cahaba Dermatology. Parking is easy, wait is usually short, staff is very friendly and Dr Groysman is great.

name: Penny Weldon
text: Nurse, Dawn was so warm & friendly to me. My Dr was equally fabulous, professional and so kind in examining and taking care of my skin issues. She froze them off and thoroughly explained what she was doing. Both of them eased my fears and made this such a calming process.

name: Chuck Segrest
text: Best dermatologist around! Been going to Dr Groysman since she was at UAB.. She, her PA, and her entire staff is GREAT!

name: Barbara Conner
text: She was very helpful I go back in too weeks

name: Mary Kelly Cantrell
text: Kayla was so nice! It was my first facial, and I didn’t really know what to expect, but she was great! I definitely recommend getting a facial done here. They will treat you right!

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation.

name: Tara Murphy
text: Amazing staff.. very helpful.

name: Sonya Roshell
text: Very pleasant and professional experience from the receptionist to the nurse to  Dr.  Gerard. AAA+++

name: April Butler
text: The office was clean and the atmosphere relaxing. The staff was very friendly and respectful. The doctor was very informative and explained everything in a way I understood.

name: Louise Czapala
text: Super compliant with safety measures regarding COVID-19! Staff is attentive & helpful. My wait time was longer than expected, but not excessive. Very pleased with Doctor & plan of action!

name: Steven Stanfa
text: Cahaba dermo is great! I have been with them about year for an allergic reaction I acquired with my job. They were very profesional and courteous with me. The doc I was seeing left and the transition to the new doctor was seamless and easy. They are very responsive with needs. I needed papwork/notes/diagnosis stuff the day of appointment and it was available about an hour after my appointment. Would recommend to anyone for dermotology needs.

name: Noah Whitaker
text: Dr. Groysman is fantastic!! She has helped me is so many ways!! If you ever need a fabulous dermatologist please visit Dr. Groysman at Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Carol Schablow
text: Love Cahaba Dermatology! They offer so many services and their staff is so knowledgeable

name: Jim Imhof
text: Very professional encounter. Efficient check in, nominal wait time, courteous treatment and Dr Grosman did a systematic check of my skin. Very please with experience 👍

name: Bessie Tan
text: Kari did an AMAZING job of getting my tight shoulders/neck/back to relax. She was professional and pleasant and I feel a gazillion times better after my massage! Im looking forward to my next one already!

name: Deborah Lambert
text: Very accommodating and friendly!  Cari, the massage therapist, found all my problems areas and took care of them. The massage was tailored to what I needed!

name: John D Williams
text:
Kind, considerate staff & a nice facility. Cahaba Dermatology is a class organization.
Keira, Laura & Amanda were the ones I remember but everyone was very friendly & helpful.

name: Brandon Killingsworth
text: The appointment service was prompt and speedy. The staff and doctors were very courteous and caring.

name: david r. Daniels
text:
A very good appointment
Gabriel was very kind and helpful. The doctor came in and helped me and Gabriel finished up. She was very professional and did a great job helping me with my prescriptions

name: Brittany M. Whetstone
text: I will absolutely be back! This place is everything you would want when going to pamper yourself! Everyone is super nice, all smiles. The environment is full of positive vibes and I love ❤️ that! They make you comfortable and have much to offer. I recommend Cahaba Dermatology to anyone looking for a place to get a facial or any pampering needs!

name: Nicole Compher
text: Great first experience and pleasant staff! I thought that the deposit was the cost of the facial, so I was caught off-guard by how much I spent, but would go back again. Also, the lady at the front desk hooked me up with coffee and a breakfast bar!! Just what I needed from a spa

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your visit. Sorry there was some confusion on the deposit payment. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Marlana Smedley
text: Horrible went in for laser hair removal and ended up with multiple burns. I sent pictures in and was told to come into the office so they could take a look. When I got there Dr Groysman was extremely rude and arrogant. She proceeded to tell me that they put the laser on the “African American setting”, which there’s no such thing. I’ve had laser hair removal done  before and knew what to expect from the process...and burns were not it. If you are African American I would advise you not to go here. Spend your money where you will be treated with respect. I would give zero stars if it was an option

name: Ray Robbins
text:
The waiting room was very comfortable but the wait was so short that I did not have time to read before I was called back to an examination room.  There the assistant asked the normal standard questions.  She was nice and courteous.  She instructed me as to what to do to be prepared for the doctor to make her examination.  Almost as soon as I was undressed and in the gown given to me to wear, the doctor came in.  The doctor was very warm and polite and quickly began her examination to determine if I had any molds of concern.  She was very professional and did find one mold that was questionable so she took a biopsy of that mold.
I am so pleased with the care given to me, that I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatology.

name: Adelle Sims
text:
Arrived early and had to wait an hour and a half to see the doctor.
Nurse and doctor both rude, especially nurse.
Terrible staff.
Terrible service.

Nurse kept calling me mom and talking down to me because I had to leave because I was late to a work appointment (didn’t plan on having to wait so long to see the doctor).

Would Not recommend this office to anyone!

name: D Thompson
text: Very professional, the doctor explained things thoroughly and there was not a long wait.

name: Amelia Johnson
text: Always extremely clean and everyone is friendly. Saw the new Doctor, Dr. Wang, and she was very thorough; I felt very comfortable with her and her assessment of my skin.

name: Will Abreu (beautybyWill)
text: Have been there before for skin issues and they have always been great! This time went for my first round of Botox and they were wonderful with that too. Definitely going back when it wears off and get my filler too next time

name: Amy Everson
text: Forget everything you know about a dermatologist office! I cannot say enough positive things about Spa Cahaba! It’s a beautiful spa that offers all the amenities you want when looking for a spa day of pampering. I went in to float in their float pool (if you’ve never heard of it, look it up- amazing experience!) and came out SO relaxed. I followed it up with a massage from Elizabeth- amazing! She was so careful to address my individual needs, checked in on the pressure to ensure I was comfortable and having a positive experience. It helped my chronic pain and relaxed me to the point that my nightly sleep improved immediately. Everyone was so kind and helpful. Beautiful quiet room, snacks, drinks, etc. Fluffy robe and slippers, you name it. They showed me around and made sure I had everything I needed. I can’t wait to go back!

name: Ken Blake
text: My wife and I both had appointments today with Dr. Wang. Everyone was great and we were out quickly!

name: Quenetta Barbee
text: Always very pleasant and professional. Wait time is very minimal. The staff is very good with explaining all medications.

name: Gretchen Covington
text: Everyone at this office is so helpful! Valerie is very knowledgeable about the products and skin issues I’m having. Jane at the front desk is very sweet and attentive! The office is very clean and modern. I’ve had acne scars for quite some time... I’m finally beginning my journey and couldn’t feel better about it!

name: Robin Oglesby
text: I love Cahaba Dermatology. Great doctors and amazingly, awesome staff!

name: richard weinstein
text: Fantastic professional treatment for me as dr gearlds patient over 40 years

name: Abbey Thompson
text: I’ve had massages all my adult life.....this one, by far was the best I’ve ever had. Kari was Amazing and I’ll be back soon!!!!

resp.text: What an compliment! Thanks for the kind words. Kari and our staff appreciate that we can impact our patients in a positive way.

name: Khanijah Richardson
text: They are super fast! They had me in and out of my appointment in no time! Additionally, they are extremely helpful! I highly recommend them!

name: Jan Nunnally
text:
Masks worn by all.. got to me in a timely manner.
Very pleased!

name: Debra Lee Talbott
text: very awesome experience, polite & super friendly staff & comfortably pleasant environment.

name: Burthia Booker
text: This is the dermatological/spa experience that I have been looking for in Birmingham. Professional, attentive, with staff and estheticians that actually listen and are more interested in healthy, beautiful skin than selling expensive peels and treatments without actually examining their client's skin. I have been working with Dominique,  and she is amazing. Friendly, interested, and caring with exceptional technique and insight. I look forward to continuing my journey with her towards healthy, beautiful skin.

name: Deborah Brooks
text: Everyone is very professional and courteous.

name: Monique Houle
text: Efficient, quick, friendly service all around, didn't even have to wait more than 5 minutes past appointment time. I was impressed!

name: Dona Luna
text:
The staff at Cahaba Dermatology is very professional and friendly.
Tracy Humphryes is one of their aestheticians and is extremely knowledgeable and an expert in her field.  I would highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Jennifer Howard
text: Dr Groysman does an excellent job and she is wonderful with her patients!!! I have been coming here for over a year now and every experience has been wonderful! I recommend them to anyone that is needing help or wants cosmetic work done they are awesome!!! Staff is wonderful too

name: Ac Drummer
text: It was very good,l will give a 5""

name: Latrice Mason
text: I Love This Establishment...Everyone Is Very Polite and Professional!!!

name: Ken Gross
text: I really like all the staff, the facility and everything about Cahaba Dermatology and Health Spa.

name: denise jeffries
text: Dr Groysman is the best.

resp.text: Thanks for kind words

name: Aisha Hoyle
text: The dermatologist that I saw was very professional, gave me some direct, factual answers to an issue that I have been worried sick about for almost 4 years. Also, while I was waiting, I was looking at their products for different skin types, and they had someone right there that specializes in that to help! I have rosacea and my face gets really angry at times, to the point of hurting down to my bones in my face, and I bought three products for my skin type that they suggested, and the total was only $104.00. That may sound like a lot, but I bought the largest size of two of the products, and she even told me...”open the spray first, it was the least expensive, and spray your face with it, and you will tell a difference within 3 minutes,”and I did! It was so soothing and calmed my face down as I sat in my car before leaving! She told me if I didn’t get a result from that, bring the other two products back and get my money back! When she said that, I knew she was genuinely trying to help me, and she did! My face has never felt as good as it feels, and looks from using these particular products! I have spent a lot of money trying to buy healthy products, trying to get some relief, to the point that my husband was not happy, at all, whenever I wanted to order another product! All I can say is that I felt like everyone there, was there to truly help people. Skin issues can be a very personal issue and it has been very difficult for me, but my skin is doing better than ever! I made an appointment for my 14 year old son that day, and another for myself! I won’t be going anywhere else. Cahaba Dermatology is top notch!

name: Temple Marston
text: My 84 year old father came in to float in the salt water float pool. He thoroughly enjoyed every moment at the spa.  He was greeted with warmth and kindness and it didn’t stop there.  He was pampered and left walking better, relaxed and feeling better overall.  The staff have customer service down and go above and beyond to help and make patients feel special.

name: Briana JTV
text: I was only there for around 20 minutes and I fell in love. It smells wonderful everyone was so sweet and pleasing. They made me feel so comfortable and I will gladly be going back.

name: Elaine Jackson
text: I love Cahaba Dermatologist and my Doctor there Dr. Groysman and the staff are all professionaly polite and friendly.. I'm improving and i feel good going there

name: Jessica Stodden
text: Very clean and nice. They have been very helpful thus far

name: Cindy McRee
text: Wonderful, friendly, professional and clean practice. Dr. Ann Gerald is an excellent dermatologist!

name: Sandra Evers
text: Fabulous one to one information and follow up care!!! I was nervous and the clinician made me feel so comfortable and at peace.  Great environment and friendly service 👍.  I would highly recommend!

name: Katherine Morgida
text: Very posh office and environment, the staff are always polite, professional, and take my concerns seriously. I have even been able to email them a picture after having an unexpected reaction to a medication. They provided help and a new treatment plan without me having to schedule and pay for an additional office visit so close after the last one. The nursing staff reassured me they would be there to help if anything else came up. Truly, they go above and beyond to provide high quality care. They will also help you get your medications affordably by sourcing from mail order pharmacies if your insurance is being difficult. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐, They're the best.

name: Meleah Montgomery
text: I was a new patient because my old dermatologist could not see me in a timely manner. I sent out a request on yelp to be seen by a dermatologist and they responded immediately and said I could be seen the NEXT DAY! They staff was so friendly and inviting! The paperwork was all online so it was easy to get it all done. I was in and out in less than an hour. They have some skin care products available for purchase, but they also suggest cheaper options if people do not want to spend too much. I saw Dr. Gunn and she was amazing and understood my need to see her. When I left I was still confused on my skin care routine, so I called back and left a voicemail. She called me back later day and made sure all my questions were answered. From the Dr., to the receptionist, to the women who checked me out, they all were very helpful. I would recommend this business to my friends and family for their excellent service!

name: Jenn C
text: My experience here was just wonderful! The staff was knowledgeable and helpful. Dr.  Gunn has a wonderful demeanor. She is gentle,  kind,  and reassuring  during examination. She addresses your concerns with medical and practical solutions to fit your budget and lifestyle.

name: Harvey Deane
text: The experience was very enjoyable and I look forward to future services at Spa Cahaba. I had my first ever facial with Valerie and it was blissful. I highly recommend Valerie and Spa Cahaba

name: Emmily Woods
text: Ms. Elizabeth and Ms. Amanda in the Light clinic are wonderful. Thanks for the excellent service and care.

name: Ken Martin
text: Excellent. Great doctor and staff.

name: Steve VanGilder
text: Overall I am satisfied but I wish I could be seen at my appointment time and not 20 minutes late

name: Morgan Driskell
text: Absolutely amazing! Went in with a few moles that worried me and they checked them, explained all the different types of moles I had, and put my mind at ease. Also helped recommend a great sunscreen! Great staff and great people!

name: martha ledlow
text: Tracey was a great aesthetician.  Will definitely be going back.

name: Jess N.
text: A little disappointed in my experience at CD. I felt rushed and I was told that I wouldn’t be able to address all of my skin concerns since I was scheduled for a full body check up. My medical assistant was rude and had terrible bedside manners. Luckily, my provider was extremely friendly, knowledgeable and a breath of fresh air.

name: S B
text: Beautiful building.  Friendly front desk staff.  Rude doctors and administrators.  Good luck trying to hear back from them or billing.  I'd advise looking elsewhere.

name: Theresea Kilgore
text: This spa is state of the art and has a wonderfully friendly and helpful staff.  Beautiful and relaxing from beginning to end. I highly recommend Cahaba Spa to anyone looking for a great spa experience

name: chuncie bowie
text: Staff and doctor was very knowledgeable and helpful  and soo friendly

name: Whitney Thomas
text: I have gotten two facials from Laura Cook and had the best experience!  She is not only a super sweet person but also keeps my sensitive skin in mind when choosing techniques and products. In the past with other estheticians, I’ve left red faced and burning. Not with Laura. My skin feels and looks the best it’s ever looked after seeing Laura. She also recommended great skin care products for me to use daily at home. She believes in just recommending the necessary products so you’ll actually use them. Highly recommend her!!

name: Kami Williams
text: The receptionists are very welcoming. The wait time was not too bad. Dr. Gunn has a very sweet manner about her and is also very informative. I will be using them for all my dermatological needs for the foreseeable future.

name: Gary Sowards
text: Dr. Groysman & her entire staff are the best.  From check-in to check-out, its pleasant & relaxing.  Thanks to everyone for making my wife & I feel so safe & appreciated!

name: Sue Lee
text: Great office & Doctor. Couldn’t ask for anything better!

name: Wayne Kennedy
text: Love Dr Groysman. Always concerned, always caring.

name: Brad Peak
text: Doctor Groysman and her staff are always great people to deal with. I am only giving two stars because my appointment was at 10:50AM and I showed up 10 minutes early to of course be courteous and timely.   However, I was not called back for my 10:50 appointment until almost 11:50.  Kinda defeats the whole purpose of having an appointment.

name: Johnny Kelley
text: I had an appointment on Wednesday with dr Ann Gerald and dawn I was treated excellent from the time I signed in at front desk until I was checked out this place is the best of the best to go for your dermatology  needs . Good clean facilities kind hearted people working with company whole staff gets five stars . March 18-2020 .

name: John Harrod
text: Try clicking on any of the providers below Dr. Groysman's photograph and see  if you can get any  information about them.. You can't,  because the website doesn't work. It hasn't worked  for months and apparently the owners don't care.  Now if a large dermatology practice doesn't care enough to have a working website, what else don't they care about?

resp.text: John, Our website is one of the few things we outsource to third party providers. Obviously, something is not working correctly and I've notified our webmaster. We also have a new website in construction that will provide better speed and function. Please call our office in the meantime if you need specific information on our providers. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, but your post is a review of our website and not our services. As we are a medical provider and pride ourselves on our quality service from check-in to check-out. Please consider evaluating us for our customer service and medical or spa services. Regards,

name: Brittney Crump
text: Courteous staff and clean office. The doctor we saw was very patient with my child. She answered all questions and made sure we felt comfortable with her diagnosis. Easy to find office with plenty of parking.

name: Veronica Johnson
text: Love Dr G! She is genuine and down to earth!

name: Thomas Yirak
text: Great staff, very friendly and thorough.  Highly recommend.

name: Shelly Smith
text: Incredible facility with friendly and professional staff, service provided was excellent and timely.

name: Angela Ward
text:
Easy new patient check in ever! Very professional staff. The building is beautiful and extremely clean with very pleasing decor and lighting.
The nurse and Dr Glick were very engaged in conversation about my reason for visiting. The doctor and other staff members that I encountered took time to talk to me as a person and not just as another medical case. It was a refreshing experience indeed.

name: Ashley Shepherd
text: The receptionists were all very sweet and the dermatologist was refreshingly helpful.

name: lizbeth alvarado
text: Dawn is 10/10 the best & Dr.Gerald is my fave !

name: EmilyAnne Chenoweth
text: I absolutely recommend Cahaba Dermatology & Skin Health Center! I have been to a couple Doctors there most recently Dr.Gunn, she prefers a more natural approach to Botox etc. (which is hard to find) and is very experienced and skilled to be able to create great results not to mention she’s an absolute doll! All the staff there are so helpful and kind! They make you want to come back!

name: Quazzicle Schap
text: We did a couples float and a couples massage. Environment is nice. Wonderful staff. Great place to get away.

name: Amanda Blackwell
text: Tracy was very professional and did an amazing job on my brows.

name: Laura Petro
text: I recently went to Cahaba Dermatology and Skin Health Center for the first time.  I saw Dr. Glick.  I had seen her years ago and needed a new dermatologist so I made an appointment.  The office is easy to get to and is really nice.  Dr. Glick is a wonderful doctor.  She's easy to talk with and she explains what is going on and what concerns her.  I got the results of some path tests within a week and by phone.  I will definitely be a patient of hers for life.

name: Hilary Wood
text: Dr. Gunn is absolutely amazing. She saved my skin after years of horrible cystic acne! She is so sweet and will go above and beyond to help you and take care of all your needs and concerns. Her staff is also just as amazing. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who is suffering with any sort of skin issue or acne issue! They will get tour skin exactly where it needs to be!!!

name: Hal Williams
text: The facilities are excellent and staff always seem to have a smile on their faces. Minimum waiting time. Dr. Groysman is an experienced well respected dermatologist and provides superb care.

name: John Allen Dees
text: Floated. Different than floating in pods but good. Much larger pool. Very nice staff.

name: Michael Cooley
text: Great place! The doctors and staff  are very professional and work hard to give you the best care. They spend the necessary time with you to explain and discuss your needs and course of treatment. You never feel rushed with them and they’re very pleasant as well.

resp.text: Michael, We understand a quality skin exam can't be rushed. Thanks for making a note of this. Reminds us we are sticking to our mission.

name: Marilyn Windham
text: I am pleased to have been under the care of Doctor Glick from the beginning of her practice. Her compassion for excellence in patient care is outstanding.  I am so blessed and confident to be under her expert care.

name: Judy New
text: Everyone there is so nice.  They always have a beautiful smile on their faces.  They always answer all my questions and explain what they are doing and why.

name: Mike Cottingham
text: Staff was great, waited a little long before going back, was told chart was put in wrong place, that's understandable. The person who saw me wasn't actually the doctor, but took pictures and showed them to the doctor. That was a little strange to me,  if the doctor could consult with her about the pictures of my condition why not take the time to see me and consult with me,being a new patient. Was my first dermatology visit, maybe they all do this, I dont know. Other than that all was good

resp.text: Mr. Cottingham, Thanks for the feedback. We offer appointments with physicians as well as our physician assistant. We understand this is a patient preference and are free to make changes to your provider at any time. Sounds like you were pleased with care and we are very confident in our PA, but of course this remains your choice. Thanks

name: Debbie Collins
text:
I had my first appointment here yesterday. The nurse was absolutely amazing! So very informative and friendly!  The dr was very friendly and informative too. I did feel tat the doctor rushed through my appointment. She did a full body check on me and quickly did two biopsies and froze off one spot. Then she was out of the room.
I wanted to talk to her about my complexion, as I had put that on my paper work when I filled it out.
I didn’t get to do that.
I had hoped to talk about some issues I had been having for years with my pores and had hoped that this was the place that I could finally get help.
I was just rushed with my time with the doctor.
Even though she was very nice.
Maybe I need to learn to speak up.
It was close to lunchtime though 😩

resp.text: Ms. Collins, Each visit is unique and there are often many things happening being the scenes, especially with biopsy's and other procedures. Of course we don't want patients to feel rushed and providers typically make a point to address all concerns and determine if additional visits will be needed. We do offer full cosmetic consultations. Please contact our office if you would like to set this up so we can partner with you in resolving or improving your areas of concern. Best

name: Donna Vickery
text: Love Dr. Groysman and staff at Cahaba Dermatology!  They make each patient feel special and cared for.  I am very happy with the results of their care.

name: Gary Perkins
text:
I have been a patient for a few years.
I had to call to reschedule an appointment.
Because I couldn’t give a 24 hour notice, I was charged $50.00.
After speaking with the Manager, I was very disappointed.
I got the feeling that according to her they were now to big to care about the patient.
Its as if they don’t need my business any more, they have plenty.
It isn’t  about the unfair charge, it’s about me just being a dollar amount to them.
I will not be returning to them, i will find a Dermatologist that cares about me not just my money.
Very disappointed with the Manager and the attitude toward me.
There are plenty of other Dermatologist out there, it would be best to find one.

resp.text: Mr. Perkins. We value every patient that we care for. Our office policies are clearly stated at the time of appointment booking, on confirmation messages, and on our in-office paperwork. Charging a fee is a last resort in most cases and something we never want to do. I regret this has left you feeling less valued.

name: Alyssa Carman
text:
Amazing staff. There was a little wait at the beginning. But the nurse who welcomed me in apologized for that and said it’s not normal. Then I had a little incident with my baby who was with me and everyone was so kind and understanding and helpful! And then the main reason I was there was for my acne and the doctor prescribed me things that were safe while breastfeeding. She explained what was going on, too. I’m about 2 weeks in with her suggestions and my skin has significantly improved. I will definitely continue to come here for my skin health needs.

Update: I have been to this location 3 times now and each time I have had an hour + wait. So the first time was not an isolated experience. Today is July 13th, 2020. Jefferson county has put a message out saying masks are required to help stop the spread until there is a vaccine. Unfortunately, this location is subject to this “requirement” and after asking if I had to even with the recent announcement that the WHO has come out and said in a press conference that “it is rare for an asymptomatic person to spread COVID. “ So now we are in an era where counties and the businesses in them will pander to fear that is unfounded as of today with the death rate of Covid well below 1%. We will see what the future holds for Covid. If it mutates into a more dangerous strand, I will re-assess my frustration with businesses like this. But in the mean time, I will speak my mind and spread truth about what Covid is. I’m sick and tired of being forced to wear a mask that will spike my carbon dioxide intake that has been proven to lower my immune system along with many other side effects. And all in the name of waiting for a vaccine that will still not have a long term trial study under its belt to make sure that there are not any severe long term side effects. And in case you are not aware, there are plenty of vaccines that have side effects that do not show up right away. One example of this is thimerosal (Mercury) was removed or reduced from vaccine use. Heck, Johnson and Johnson just settled with plaintiffs who experienced many different cancers decades after the use of JJ baby powder. BABY POWDER!! So I have serious concern with an inoculation that will most likely be required, like the masks are, to “stop the spread” (of a disease that is recording low death rates) that will not have long term testing to make sure that we aren’t doing more harm than good. But that’s my two cents.  I will most likely end up moving my derm needs to an office that not only can figure out how to not have hour waits for their patients but is brave enough to look the stats and facts in the face and take a stand against the current overstep we are seeing all over the country.

All in all, the people here are very kind, and the doctor I’ve been seeing seriously helped with my adult acne. So  I will give them 4 stars. I recongize it’s hard to stand against the grain. But the hour plus waits have been very hard since I bring my infant with me to these appointments.

Lastly, they also require hand sanitizer and temp check. These are things that do not bother me personally, and I still complied with all that was asked of me.

Finally, when my wife's condition started getting better they run out of the medication that was making it better. Then, they don't get any of the medication for her to use again. text: I have called several times for a prescription refill, left numerous messages( because no one will answer the phone), and CVS has faxed a request 3 times.  No one will contact us.  The prescription has been empty for 2 weeks now.  No one will even call us back for an appointment.  We are done.

resp.text: Ms. Johnson, sorry to hear of your issue. We have been open all day and having no issues with phone calls. I don't have enough information to contact you directly from your post. Please make sure you are calling our office number at 205-214-7546. If you call back after hours, please leave a message our nurses to return call Monday morning. Thanks,

name: Beth Dykes
text: Professional, friendly, informative.   I’m going back!

resp.text: We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Richard Harley
text: Excellent staff and facilities

name: Rose Potts
text: In and out within one hour, which is great, considering most dermatologist I've sat there two hours before seeing a doctor. I had a skin cancer screening today, probably the most thorough I have ever had. She checked every inch of my body. Had one questionable spot which was biopsied; totally painless. I was told I would hear back from the biopsy (either negative or positive) by the end of the week. Dr. Groysman answered all of my questions. Her nurse explained the wound care and gave me written information on another spot I had questions about. Everyone had a sense of humor, which always makes you feel more comfortable. I inquired about a cosmetic consultation, Dr. Groysman said she does cosmetic consultations herself. She didn't "encourage" any cosmetic procedures, she simply answered my questions regarding the consultation. Although these services available, it was a good feeling to have a dermatologist seem concerned about the "health" of my skin not just cosmetically how it appeared.

name: Kathleen Spencer
text:
Going to a dermatologist can be somewhat daunting, especially if you have never been to one before.  If you are looking to be treated with respect and understanding, this is the skin health center to go to.  Dr. Groysman is wonderful, and will put you at ease immediately.  Her staff is delightful and the care you receive is beyond reproach.  The clinic treats everything from acne to skin cancer screening to spider veins to botox, and even has spa services, along with a great line of cosmetic products.

I rarely take the time to write a review, but this place certainly deserves raves.

name: Randal Ford
text: Fast, efficient and knowledgeable. Welcoming staff and great physicians.  Would recommend to everyone.  A+

name: Kristie P. LaRochelle
text: Love, Love, Love Vlada. She is great dermatologist and knows her stuff. She takes the time to understand your conditions and get you the proper treatment needed. I would recommend her to all of my friends and family.

name: Denise O'Rourke
text: Dr. Groysman is very gentle, patient, and thorough.

name: S A
text: Dr Groysman performed IPL and Pico Genesis on my face for dark spots.  She has left permanent damage on my face.  The texture of my face now is like an alligator with no other way to describe and other problems. It has been over a year since my last procedure.  Had terrible flair up at the time. She referred me in the end to a dermatologist at UAB which was unable to reverse the permanent damage she caused.

name: Tomiko Porter
text: 3rd Visit, 4th month for following treatment plan. Excellent results. Dr. Glick has a shining personality, is friendly and personable. She suggested a couples visit and I brought my husband this time for his first visit.

resp.text: We always can count on Dr. Glick to provide excellent care with a healthy dose of friendly personality. So glad you enjoyed the visit. Good to hear you are spreading the healthy skin bug.

name: Caroline Crisp
text: Great experience at Cahaba Dermatology! Dr. Groysman showed great skill, professionalism, and compassion. Also, the staff members were super friendly and helpful. I am looking forward to my next visit!

name: Mike Christopher (1-WHO-1)
text: Very poor billing practices. Had 1 brief visit, and was charged two separate consultation fees of $85 at time of service an another $140 billed by mail. Asked after the leaving the office "do I owe anything else" and the answer was "no". They were able to refund the $85 after initially declining the refund.

name: Jacob Story
text: Just moved to the Bham area and glad I did not waste much time finding a dependable dermatologist. From the friendly administrative assistant to the dermatologist, the entire staff genuinely cares about your experience from booking the appointment to billing.

resp.text: We are proud to have made a good impression and glad you found a great place for Dermatology in Alabama.

name: Marie Sharpe
text: I highly recommend Cahaba Dermatology.  The office is nice and the staff are very friendly.  I cannot say enough good things about Aesthetician Valerie Esposito.  I have had several sessions with her and she is as professional as they come.

name: Brandi Dover
text: I've been seeing Dr. Groysman about an issue that I've had for over 10 years and no one has been able to help me until now. I've had lab work done before by other doctors, but none as thorough as Dr. Groysman. She is very kind and really cares about her patients. My issue has been very difficult to deal with all of these years and this is the first time a doctor has given me hope for a treatment. I highly  recommend everyone go to her if you need a GOOD dermatologist - one that will actually get to the bottom of your problems and cares to see you get better. I am so very thankful I have found her.

name: Hannah Oden
text: I love this facility! Very sweet staff, made me feel very comfortable. I will defiantly be back soon!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for kind words! We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Debra Gilbreath
text:
I had an appointment  with  Dr Groysman in 2016. It was my first appointment with Cahaba Dermatology the day I went it must have been a busy day for them, I waited that day about 45 min and people
were getting called into see her while I was still sitting out in the waiting room it ended up being me & one other lady that day which she was there before I was , I finally got called in and left her sitting there.
I met Dr. Groysman and we proceeded with my appointment she biopsied a place on my ear I was having problems with.  My results came back and everything was okay. I still have problems
with my ear from time to time was the reason I made the 2nd appointment – fast forward to May 2018 and I called and made an appointment with her Nurse Practitioner& was told when I called in that I had a balance from 2016 that would have to be paid – Im not sure about their billing department but I didn’t know about the balance & I told her that I would pay it. If I had known about a past due  and call to make an appointment is that someone that is trying not to pay? So we made the appointment went in today 6/7 my appointment was at 11:00 I get to my appointment she collects my co-pay I go sit down and she calls me back to the front desk and proceeds to tell me that she collected the co-pay not realizing there was the balance due and I would need to pay or I
couldnt go thru with my  appointment. I told her I couldn’t pay it all today – that I could pay it tomorrow and she said she would have to speak with someone in billing – so this other young lady  comes out and says basically the same thing the other one  did with the exception -she said that someone had called me and left a voice mail for me & did I not get the voice mail? & on that VW stated I had to pay this. Which I said no  & I told her the same thing  - I get paid tomorrow and I would pay it then -  she says I couldn’t keep the appointment if I didn’t pay today. So I had to leave.   This review is not about whether I got to keep my appointment or not, its not about the balance I owe, its about how people are treated, all this was handled out at the front desk instead of asking me to step to the side, step into the 2nd  young ladies office , or go stand out front and wait for the police to arrive to hand cuff me is the way I felt  Just as the 1st appointment  was not good , my 2nd time there was even worse. I was so humiliated that other people could hear what was going on. I owe the money - but I would rather other people not know that I owe that money. I wish I would have paid more attention to the girls names, but I do remember faces. I had not intentions of not paying the balance due.

My cousin goes to Dr. Groysman - he has all great things to say about her as a Doctor & as a person. He thinks very highly of her & her practice. He is the reason I made the 2nd appointment -he said I should try again.
My cousin's name is Don Amick. He was also surprised that I couldn't keep my appointment today. BTW they took my co-pay and took it off my past due amount. My balance was 125.00 and not I only owe 95.00. That's right 95.00 not 200.00, not 300.00, not 500.00. It was 125.00. I've never written a review, while I know this is a long review - I just couldn't let this go. I felt this was just wrong the way I was humiliated in front of everyone Oh and I had to walk all the way back to my seat get my purse and then back in front of them again as they were watching me leave.

name: Jay Cox
text: Nice friendly staff, quick and easy visit.

name: Joel
text: I would not advise anyone to be a client with this establishment.

name: Michael Johnson
text: An organized and friendly practice with top level staff and expertise. You will not be disappointed.

name: Tripp Rogers (TR)
text: Do not go to this office. Dr. is a quack.  Misdiagnosed my daughter.  I spent 200 on cream that she didn't even need.  Got a 2nd opinion and this Dr. stated she must be crazy to have given us that diagnosis.  Stay away!

name: JERROD BALLARD
text: Clean office, very nice staff, great place to go

name: Civille Brown
text: Excellent dermatologist who knows her stuff.

name: David Farr
text: Very good cancer screening.

name: Lara B
text: I took my teenage daughter to that place for bad acne. We didn't actually see Dr Vlada, her NP was prescribing all the medications she knew I guess. After about a year Dr finally came to the room to examine her because after months of antibiotics, creams and numerous other meds her face stayed the same. She personally promised my daughter it would get better with another prescriptions.... you can imagine what it means for a teenager! Several months later still no change. I felt like my daughter was a Guinie pig! So the last resort was Accutane and after a week my daughter could not move or get out of bed that's how poisonous it was. We stopped it immediately and I took her to another Dr who diagnosed her w policystic ovaries... all she needed was a simple blood test. her face is a lot better now. I don't know how much harm all the meds she took for months did to her body. I'm just furious that nobody even suggested a blood test, they just treated the face, not the whole body. Hope our bad experience will help someone.

name: Lena Dillon
text: My checkup and the service  I received was more                                         than satisfactory!

name: Leah Eagle
text:
I, along with my parents, have been patients of Dr. Groysman for several years.
She is so knowledgable and answered all my questions. She took her time during my visits and didn't make me feel rushed.
Her office on Valleydale Road is beautiful and the staff is very friendly.
I have recommended Dr. Groysman to many friends, and they have all reports back their experience was wonderful.

name: Missy Wright
text: Dr. Groysman is a wonderful doctor. I highly recommend her :)

name: Adam Summerford
text: 2 hours was life changing!

name: Jamie Broday
text: Dr. Groysman and her staff are over and above. You can tell Dr. Groysman really cares about her patients and her office is very clean and welcoming. The wait time is minimal, the staff is friendly, and Dr. Groysman truly is a good and caring doctor.

name: Marie Sharpe

name: Janice Newlin
text: I was recommended to see Dr. Groysman for my palmoplantar psoriasis. Two other dermatologists attempted to help me treat this with systemic medications. Although the medications cleared the palmoplantar psoriasis, the side effects from them were horrible. Dr. Groysman offered two topical compound treatments that began working immediately! My palmoplantar psoriasis is under control and I couldn't be more thrilled! Dr. Groysman spends a lot of time with her patients answering all their questions and concerns. She is very kind and caring. I highly recommend her practice to anyone!

name: John Evans
text: Excellent surgery and friendly staff!

name: katina carter
text:
The staff is friendly for the most part but I went in for tattoo laser removal and it did not turn out like I was told it would or the before and after pictures shown. They did try one more treatment but told me the second would cost $200 after I had already paid $2,000 for the actual treatment. Then had me come back for a "follow up" just to charge my insurance and push me out the door (2 visits within 2 weeks of each other) just to be told I would have to pay for any extra treatments.  Something they could have told me over the phone and keep me from driving a 2 hour round trip each time. I have two children and a job.  Very inconsiderate!!!
I will never be back for any future dermatology needs.

text: I wish I could have done this sooner! Dr. Rousso is an absolute artist and couldn’t be more happy with choosing him as my doctor! My results are natural, beautiful, & life changing! 10/10 Recommend!

name: lily slater
text: Dr. Rousso did my nose about 5 years ago. He absolutely changed my life. The only thing I saw in the mirror was my nose and I hated it. Now I love my nose, and my side profile. By far the best decision I ever made. Whenever I tell someone that I had a nose job they are always surprised because my nose looks so natural and perfect on my face. I had consults with two other doctors and both of them said that they would do it but they recommended Dr. Rousso because he specializes in faces and noses. They said he would do a much better job than they could have done. I 100% recommend going to Dr. Rousso for anything face related.. because why wouldn't you want someone who specializes in faces to do your face?

name: Patricia Clark
text: I had a face lift (temple cheek neck lift w/endoscopic forehead, upper & lower eyelids, SMAS lips, nasolabial & melolabial folds) 3 months ago with Dr. Daniel Rousso.  He came with very high recommendations from numerous people I know, both personally and in the healthcare field, which led to my decision to choose him to do my surgery.  The care and expertise I received from Dr. Rousso and his team was exceptional.  My results far exceeded all expectations I had prior to surgery, and I am so grateful I made the decision to choose Dr. Rousso.

name: Virginia Limbaugh
text: I had the best experience at Dr. Rousso’s office. The staff were so nice, helpful, and thorough with helping me with everything that I needed. Dr. Rousso is the best and I could not be happier with my results!

name: Randy W. Harris
text: Dr. Russo and his amazing team are absolutely the best in the business. From first consultation to my finished procedure, Dr. Russo and staff were the epitome of professionalism. Each person was kind, compassionate, and willing to make my experience as pleasant as possible. I cannot say enough food things about Russo Plastic Surgery. I will definitely return in the future. Thank you so much Dr. Russo and team!

name: Katy Santello
text: Had a wonderful experience at Dr. Rousso’s office with Dr. Adams. The staff were friendly and efficient and I felt very comfortable in the clean and welcoming environment. Highly recommend!

name: kathi ruffino
text:
When choosing a surgeon trust is vital.
Dr Rousso   is an impeccable Surgeon. I highly recommended Dr. Rousso,  he and his staff are extremely knowledgeable and make it   comfortable to  communicate  with .
Dr. Rousso spends time during  the consultation getting to know his patients , making certain their expectations are met .

name: Bobette Brizendine
text: Fabulous experience! Staff and Dr Rousso were extremely kind and supportive before and after procedure. Traveled from Atlanta for his expertise and it was worth it. Will never let anyone else touch my face.

name: Jonatha Temple
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff were the best! They treated me like a king! The whole staff was caring professional and kind! At one point they found a neck pillow for me so I could be more comfortable, that’s above and beyond. From beginning to end , this was a great experience! If you are looking for what they do at Dr. Rousso’s office , look no further! Your in the right place.

name: Scott Smith
text: Dr. Rousso is an excellent physician and plastic surgeon.  He does more than cosmetic work.  Don't let an ENT do surgery on your nose.  Go to Dr. Rousso for any kind of nose or face surgery.  Your insurance will pay Dr. Rousso for any kind of surgery that your ENT would do.

name: JAMES HIGGINBOTHAM
text: Dr. Rousso does a fabulous job with my Botox. He injects along my hairline to ensure that my brows don't drop. He is a true expert with faces, and I will only trust Dr. Rousso with my Botox and any other facial procedures.

name: Skylar R
text: THE STAFF WAS GREAT. THEY WERE ACCOMMODATING AND VERY UNDERSTANDING. THEY WERE SENSITIVE TO MY CONCERNS AND WERE VERY COMFORTING AND MADE ME FEEL SO AT EASE. I WAS WORKED IN AFTER A PROCEDURE WITH ANOTHER DOCTOR AND NO ONE EVER MADE ME FEEL THAT I WAS ANY TROUBLE. THEY MADE ME FEEL VERY VALUED AND SAFE.

name: Susan Holt
text: Dr Rousso and his staff were so incredibly friendly. My nose is perfect. Thank you, Dr Rousso!

name: Alexis H
text: Very friendly and informative. :) I was shown a photo of what my nose was to look like before surgery (photos were taken and photo editing software was used to predict its appearance) which made me feel much better about having the procedure done. Had a check up a week later and a month later and will have a few more in a couple of months to a year.

name: Mary Margaret Lodge
text: I am 6 months post procedure and I am loving my new face! As a 61 year old women, I looked at myself in the mirror and didn't recognize myself. I resorted to dimming the lights in the bathroom and only taking quick glances at my sagging face. Between the turkey neck and the bulldog jowls, I had to do something. I received many recomendations to see Dr. Rousso and I have NO regrets! Thank you, Dr. Rousso!

name: Vanessa Askren
text:
Love my results. Dr. Rousso and his staff are attentive and professional.
This is my second procedure with Dr. Rousso.The after care is exceptional and the sitters are very  competent at their job. I highly recommend Dr. Rousso .

name: Leslie Matheson
text: I have been extremely pleased with Dr. Rousso and entire staff! Wonderful experience!

name: Nikki Dobrzynski
text: Dr. Rousso, Nancy and Brandi were fantastic! I had fillers done, even though I am horrible with needles, Dr. Rousso made sure I was ok and took breaks when needed. My results are fabulous and I couldn’t be happier with the service and the results I have received from Dr. Rousso and his amazing staff! I would highly recommend Dr. Rousso for any service that you need.

name: Susan Mccann
text: My experience was very pleasing. The staff were very professional and courteous. The sitter, Sharon Burton was great. I would highly recommend you and your practice.

name: Peyton F
text: Fantastic !!! Wonderful staff . I always felt in good hands with all involved in my care. Dr. Rousso is very caring, gentle but most importantly he strives to be exact in his profession. He kept me informed on what to expect . He is an excellent !!!

name: Kim B
text: I have absolutely loved my experience with Dr. Rousso and his staff. They are incredible and are very willing to make you happy. I know I can rely on them anytime I need them. It has been 6 years since my operation and I am very pleased with my results. Great staff!

name: Ashley G
text: I had a great experience with all the doctors here. They were extremely nice and gave me great results. I could not be more pleased with my experience here.

name: Peyton L
text: Dr. Rousso is an outstanding doctor who listens to the needs and wants of his patients. You are made to feel so very special and my results were amazing. If i knew what i know now, would I have the cosmetic surgery again. In a heartbeat.

name: Devin Day
text: Dr. Rousso is an incredible doctor who is a gifted artist when it comes to Plastic Surgery. After a few short weeks, I looked like I did 15 years ago...Many who I have not seen for sometime, wanted to know what skincare line I am using, as my skin looks firm and youthful. I have no trace of having surgery. I cannot express how incredibly satisfied I am with my outcome and would highly recommend Dr. Rousso to anyone who is considering plastic surgery.

name: Harper Hale
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Rousso. The surgery process went very smoothly and I am very pleased with my end result. My results were better than I had imagined they ever could be. If I ever had questions, it was very easy to get in touch with someone from Rousso's office. A great experience.

name: Morgan R
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff are amazing. Everyone I encountered was professional, knowledgeable, friendly, and patient. My questions were always answered in a caring manner, and this environment made me feel like a name and not just a number. I have never been more pleased. I would highly recommend Dr. Rousso to any family member or friend.

text: Dr. Rousso and his staff have taken great care of me, and I am very pleased with the results of my surgery!

name: Shawn R
text: Overall, have had a great experience with the staff and Dr. Rousso. I felt well taken care of during my surgery as well as throughout my recovery.

name: Sidney A
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff reflect a standard of excellence in every area of patient care. As an existing patient, but first-time surgery patient, the care I received was of the highest level. I would not hesitate to return for additional surgery or refer friends to Dr. Rousso.

name: Jillian Sanderson
text: I was very satisfied with the treatment and care from the doctor and staff, as well as with my results after the lip advancement.

name: Schuyler L
text: I was with my daughter at a modeling event when I met a lady with her grand-daughter. I could not believe she was old enough to have a 'grand-daughter'' She said she had interviewed doctors from all over the mid-south and had found Dr. Rousso to be the best. I must say after having used him twice now that I WOULD NOT ALLOW ANY PLASTIC SURGEON BUT DR. ROUSSO TO TOUCH MY FACE. Not only is Dr. Rousso an excellent surgeon but he is in tune with working with the patient to achieve the desired result.

name: Candace Ho
text: My experience with Dr. Rousso and staff has been all positive. From the beginning they worked me in super quickly! I made an appointment, and was in for my surgery within two weeks. I urge patients not to be frustrated by wait times. There are days your visit will be very quick, an other times you will wait. The wait just means he is in a procedure (one can not always control surrgical length) or he is spending ample time with another patient. You will get the same courtesy. All staff members have been top notch in their skill and customer service. Dr Rousso made my nose look completely natural again after a previous surgeon did NOT. I highly recommend a surgeon such as Dr Rousso if you plan on a rhinoplasty. You want someone that does facial work and not body work. I also want to add that he recommends an overnight stay at a hotel so you can be checked by his protege in the evening. I was not happy about this at first, but I promise it is well worth it in the end. Im so glad I stayed and Dr Richards was able to check my progress. I also appreciated the help from the sitter. Dr Rousso and staff have a very together and smooth running operation with great results.

name: Gale H
text: Dr. Rousso has measured up to all of my expectations. I am very pleased with the outcome of both my rhinoplasty and my chin augmentation.

name: Hayden R
text: Dr Rousso makes you feel as if your family. He and his staff always take the time to make you feel as if you belong. I never feel as if I am being rushed through a system. Having had two previous procedures to repair a deviated septum. It wasn't until I meet Dr Rousso, that I was finally able to breath and had a straight nose to look at in the mirror! ~ HDR

name: Ron Foster
text: My wife and I both have used Dr. Rousso with excellent results. There is none better!

name: Morgan England
text: Amazing! Wouldn't go to anyone else for dermal fillers.

text: Dr. Rousso and his staff made me feel comfortable through every step of my mini-facelift, mid-facelift, and bleph. The results are fabulous with a younger looking 'me'...no stretched look.

name: Alice Smith
text: Dr. Rousso was conscientious, caring, and compassionate in his demeanor with his patient, a friend of mine, and in his sharing of information regarding her surgery.

name: cyndycantley
text: Love Dr Rousso and his staff!

text: STEER CLEAR. Cost me $20,000 to fix what he did.

name: Judy Hughes
text: Everything was great.
